pf.analytics
Class LineImpl

java.lang.Object
  pf.analytics.LineImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Line
Direct Known Subclasses:
GridLineImpl
public class LineImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Line

Default implementation of Line.

This suppose line is infinite and two of them are same iff one covers the other.

Author:
Adam Juraszek

extend

public Line extend(float f)
Description copied from interface: Line
Makes the line factor-times longer to both ends.

factor=0: returned line is the same
factor=1: returned line is three times longer
factor: returned line is (factor*2+1) times longer

Specified by:
extend in interface Line
Parameters:
f - how much bigger is the new line
Returns:
longer line

getPoint

public Point getPoint(float f)
Description copied from interface: Line
Line is set of points and each of them is represented by a particular value of factor.

For factor=0 returns P1
For factor=1 returns P2

Specified by:
getPoint in interface Line
Parameters:
f - how far from P1 in multiples of base vector
Returns:
point which lies on this line
See Also:
Line.baseVector()

intersection

public Point intersection(Line l)
may not return actual intersection because of integer based interface Point

intersection is calculated by Cramer's rule

Specified by:
intersection in interface Line
Parameters:
l - line which is tested for intersections with this line
Returns:
intersection point of both lines or null if doesn't exist
